original_text: “In the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, you shall celebrate the Feast of the Passover, and for seven days unleavened bread shall be eaten.
korean_text: 첫째 달 열나흗날에는 유월절을 칠 일 동안 명절로 지키며 누룩 없는 떡을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: on the fourteenth day of the month,
you shall celebrate the Feast of the Passover,
and for seven days unleavened bread shall be eaten.
sentences.korean_translation: 칠 일 동안 누룩 없는 떡을 먹어야 합니다.
